originalTitle: Sassy Fascination Water Works (STEM)
originalBody:
Sassy Fascination Water Works (STEM)
Age: 12 months +
As a child begins play with the Fascination Water Works, they begin to understand why things happen and how things work. The scooping cup allows for the child to fill, measure and pour water, introducing the concept of math. Moving parts within each tube will fascinate and keep her engaged! Connect the pieces together to create a chain or separate for individual play. 
Moving parts pique a child's interest as the learn the cause and effect of adding water to the toy
Interchangeable tubes snap together, providing manipulation challenge appropriate for little hands
Spinning parts encourage a higher level of eye tracking and visual exploration
Scooping cup allows baby to fill, measure and pour water, introducing the concept of math
Through number recognition, baby is introduced to the concept of math
The Fascination Water Works promotes early STEM learning by teaching a child about:
- Observation
- Simple machine
- Constructing
title: 俏皮迷人水工程（STEM）
body: 俏皮迷人水工程（STEM）年齡：12個月以上當孩子開始用俏皮迷人水工程玩耍時，他們開始理解事物發生的原因以及事物如何運作。舀水杯讓孩子可以裝滿、測量和倒水，介紹了數學的概念。每個管內的移動部件將引起孩子的興趣並保持她投入其中！將這些零件連接在一起以創建一條鏈或分開進行個別遊戲。移動部件激發孩子的興趣，因為他們了解將水添加到玩具的原因和效果可互換的管子可以相互拼接在一起，提供適合小手的操作挑戰旋轉部件鼓勵更高水平的眼球追蹤和視覺探索舀水杯讓寶寶可以裝滿、測量和倒水，引入數學概念通過數字認識，寶寶將了解數學的概念俏皮迷人水工程通過教導孩子以下內容促進早期STEM學習：- 觀察- 簡單機械- 結構建築主題標籤：教育玩具,互動玩具,學習玩具,觀察,簡單機械,結構建築
tags: ['俏皮寶寶', '沐浴玩具', '玩具', '教育玩具', '互動玩具', '學習玩具']

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO Diapers / 無敏環保紙尿片 Size-1 (NB/初生) 28pc
originalBody:
6 packs per case / 每箱6包
Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO disposable diapers are gentle to the child’s skin and health and have a very soft textile-like back and top sheet that makes the diaper feel like soft clothing. The diaper is designed to fit a child’s anatomy perfectly, which ensures there is no leakage and makes the child feel comfortable while enabling greater freedom of movement.
Our disposable baby diapers are among the most environment-friendly diapers on the market. They are manufactured with care for the environment, and 95 % of all waste coming from the production of Bambo Nature is recycled. Furthermore, the diapers are labeled with the Nordic Eco-label, the FSC®-label, the Asthma Allergy label and are Dermatologically Tested.
Bambo Nature are proud to present all the certifications to ensure all mothers that their babies skin will be free from all the harmful chemicals. We can guarantee that!
2-5KG / 4-11 LBS

片

title: 丹麥無敏環保紙尿片 Size-1 (NB/初生) 28片
body: 每箱6包丹麥無敏環保紙尿片採用溫和的材料，對嬰兒的皮膚和健康友好，具有柔軟的紡織品般的背面和表層，讓紙尿片感覺像是柔軟的衣物。紙尿片設計完美貼合嬰兒的解剖結構，確保不漏尿，讓寶寶感到舒適，同時增加活動自由度。我們的一次性嬰兒紙尿片是市場上最環保的紙尿片之一。製造過程中對環境進行精心照料，95％的廢棄物來自Bambo Nature的生產被回收利用。此外，這些紙尿片標有北歐生態標籤、FSC®標籤、哮喘過敏標籤，並經過皮膚測試。Bambo Nature自豪地提供所有認證，以確保所有媽媽們的寶寶皮膚不受有害化學物質影響。我們可以保證！2-5公斤 / 4-11磅丹麥無敏環保嬰兒紙尿片，Size-1，初生，2-5公斤，28片/包全新升級功能！尿濕顯示開發出市場上最佳和最高品質的濕度指示器。100％無有害化學物質，無敏感。液體敏感條會變色以指示濕度。更薄的設計改良吸濕技術實現最大吸收和鎖水功能。尿布更薄，BB感到更舒適，同時保持吸收和鎖水功能。更柔軟使用更優質更柔軟的材料，提升舒適度和保護。功能升級後的Bambo Nature Dream為寶寶帶來更清爽，更舒適的體驗，讓寶寶保持乾爽，減少濕疹的可能性。產品介紹：在Bambo Nature上的北歐生態標籤，確認了我們在環保方面的努力。要獲得此標籤，我們的嬰兒紙尿片必須符合嚴格標準，其中一些包括：在我們的包裝上另一個標籤，FSC森林認證說明我們使用的木漿棉全部來自可持續森林。這裡種植的樹木必須比使用的多。同時，我們的產品通過了不同獨立機構的測試，確保Bambo Nature的紙尿片不會導致皮膚敏感或刺激。特點：· 柔軟！· 彈力十足的側腰圍。· 特強吸濕的表層讓水份迅速吸收，鎖緊後水分子除了持久不回滲更可保持乾爽。· 比堅尼式立體剪裁，讓寶寶活動自如，同時減小漏尿機會。· 清新透氣的設計，讓寶寶屁股可以自由呼吸。· Bambo Nature有6款尺寸，適合各個年齡段，由出生到學習如廁的寶寶都可以使用。

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Training Pants Size-5 (XL) 19pc
originalBody:
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
12-18KG / 27-40LBS
 
 Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-5, XL, 12-18 Kg, 19 pcs/pack
 
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.
title: 竹子天然訓練褲尺寸-5（XL）19片
body: 竹子天然的無疹痕環保一次性訓練褲不含有害化學物質和所有已知過敏原。這些訓練褲設計用於讓孩子輕鬆學習上廁所。您的幼兒將感覺自己像個大孩子，因為我們的設計柔軟、薄且易於拉上拉下。我們的訓練褲採用三層設計，具有超吸收芯，可以應對多次潮濕，甚至是整夜。就像我們的尿布一樣，竹子天然訓練褲擁有完全透氣的背板，保持嬌嫩的皮膚乾燥。12-18公斤 / 27-40磅丹麥無過敏性環保嬰兒學習褲，尺寸-5，XL，12-18公斤，每包19片新升級功能！濕度指示器開發市場上最佳和最高質量的濕度顯示。100％不含有害化學物質和不過敏。液體敏感條會變色指示濕度。更薄的設計改進吸濕技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。學習褲更薄，更舒適，不會犧牲吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好、更柔軟的材料增強舒適性和保護性。竹子天然Dream的改進功能帶來了更清新、更舒適的體驗，保持乾燥，降低濕疹可能性。產品描述：竹子天然上的北歐白天鵝環保標籤確認了我們在環保方面的努力。為了獲得該標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格標準，其中幾項包括：我們包裝上另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表示我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉都來自可持續森林。這裡，必須種植更多的樹木。同時，我們的產品還通過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保竹子天然的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。為了配合兒童的如廁訓練，竹子天然訓練褲的設計使其易於拉上拉下。此外，如果需要，訓練褲也可以從側面打開。竹子天然訓練褲的優點·這種環保尿布絕對是孩子學習如廁的好幫手·不含氯漂白劑、螢光增白劑和乳液·訓練褲中的木漿和棉都來自免費的可持續森林·腰部和腳部無乳膠·無氯漂白·透氣背襯讓孩子的皮膚呼吸，避免皮膚敏感。

· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.
title: Bambo Nature 訓練褲 Size-6 (XXL) 18片裝
body: 每箱5包Bambo Nature的無疹痕環保一次性訓練褲不含有害化學物質和所有已知過敏原。這些訓練褲設計讓小孩學習上廁所變得容易。您的幼兒將感覺像個大孩子，因為我們的設計靈活、薄且易於穿脫。我們的訓練褲採用三層設計，具有超吸收核心，即使在整夜也能承受多次尿濕。而且，就像我們的尿布一樣，Bambo Nature訓練褲具有完全透氣的背板，保持嬌嫩肌膚乾爽。18公斤以上 / 40磅以上丹麥無過敏環保幼兒訓練褲，Size-6，M，18公斤，每包18片新升級功能！濕度指示器市面上最佳和最優質的濕度顯示。100%不含有害化學物質，無過敏性。液體敏感條會變色指示濕度。更薄的設計改良了吸濕技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。訓練褲更薄，更舒適穿著，而不會犧牲吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好和更柔軟的材料，提升舒適度和保護性。Bambo Nature Dream的改進功能帶來更清新和舒適的體驗，保持干燥，減少濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實我們在環保方面的努力。為了獲得這個標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格標準，其中幾個包括：我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表示我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉都來自可持續森林。在這裡，必須種植更多的樹木比所用的樹木。同時，我們的產品也通過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。為了配合兒童的上廁所訓練，Bambo Nature訓練褲的設計使他們易於穿脫。此外，必要時，訓練褲也可以從側面打開。Bambo Nature訓練褲的優點· 這種環保尿布絕對是孩子學習如廁的好幫手· 不含氯、螢光劑和潤膚劑· 訓練褲中的木漿和棉花都來自自由可持續森林· 腰部和腳部無乳膠· 不含氯漂白· 透氣的背墊讓孩子的皮膚呼吸，避免皮膚敏感。

originalTitle: Fin Fun Shark Fin Blue
originalBody:
Fin Fun Shark Fin Blue
Ready for hours of fun in the pool? Fin Fun’s exclusive Blue Shark Fin has been redesigned with a soft, ultra-lightweight foam-like material that has been engineered just for Fin Fun! It features adjustable straps that are built for comfort and endurance. Children and adults of all ages will love pretending they’re a scary shark in this fun, imaginative Shark Fin.
This playful blue Fin Fun Shark Fin will have your kids in a frenzy! Our Shark Fin is an exciting new toy for pool games and a wonderful incentive for young swimmers to get in the pool. From toddlers to adults, the straps on our Shark Fin are comfortable, adjustable, and feature a new double-stitched buckle that secures the fin on your child for maximum water movement. Plus, our unique design features shoulder straps that enhance the safety and fit. Our Shark Fin is made from a durable ultra-lightweight foam-like material that resists stains and tears but is soft to the touch. Patent Pending.
Sizes:
Shark Fin – Our Shark Fin is adjustable and fits most chest sizes. Will fit up to a Men’s XL in most cases!
Materials & Care
100% Polyolefin
Hand rinse after each use. Air dry before storing. Avoid use of machine washers and dryers to clean, as straps may become tangled and worn.
title: 藍色Fin Fun鯊魚鰭
body: 藍色Fin Fun鯊魚鰭準備好在游泳池中玩上幾個小時了嗎？Fin Fun獨家的藍色鯊魚鰭已經重新設計，採用了一種柔軟、超輕的泡沫狀材料，專門為Fin Fun而設計！它配有可調節的帶子，旨在提供舒適和耐用性。無論是孩子還是成人，都會喜歡在這個有趣、富有想像力的鯊魚鰭中假裝成可怕的鯊魚。這款有趣的藍色Fin Fun鯊魚鰭將讓您的孩子瘋狂！我們的鯊魚鰭是游泳池遊戲的一個令人興奮的新玩具，也是激勵年輕游泳者進入游泳池的好動力。從幼兒到成人，我們的鯊魚鰭帶子舒適、可調節，並配有一個新的雙針縫扣，可確保鯊魚鰭在您的孩子身上最大程度地移動水。此外，我們獨特的設計還包括增強安全性和合適性的肩帶。我們的鯊魚鰭由耐用的超輕泡沫狀材料製成，能抵抗污漬和撕裂，但觸感柔軟。專利申請中。尺寸：鯊魚鰭 - 我們的鯊魚鰭可調節，適合大多數胸部尺寸。在大多數情況下，可適合到男士XL碼！材料和護理：100%聚烯烴每次使用後用水沖洗。風乾後再存放。避免使用洗衣機和烘乾機清洗，因為帶子可能纏結和磨損。

originalTitle: ThinkFun Code Master™
originalBody:
ThinkFun Code Master™
Age: 8 yrs +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
 
Empowering Minds Through Play
ThinkFun is the world’s leader in addictively fun games that stretch and sharpen your mind. From lighting up young minds to creating fun for the whole family, our innovative games make you think while they make you smile.
The Ultimate Coding Board Game
 Featured in Purdue University's Engineering Gift Guide
Make programming fun by learning the basics without a computer! In Code Master, your Avatar travels to an exotic world in search of power Crystals. Along the way, you use programming logic to navigate the Map. Think carefully, in each level, only one specific sequence of actions will lead to success. Once you collect all the Crystals and land at the Portal, you win! Playing Code Master won’t just teach you principles behind programming, you’ll also build planning, sequential reasoning and problem-solving skills.

title: 智趣科技 Code Master™
body: 智趣科技 Code Master™年齡：8歲以上品牌：美國製在中國負責生產透過遊戲啟發思維智趣科技是全球領先的令人上癮的有趣遊戲開發者，透過遊戲伸展和磨練您的大腦。從啟發年輕心靈到為全家人創造樂趣，我們創新的遊戲讓您在玩的同時思考，同時帶給您笑容。終極編程棋盤遊戲被列入普渡大學工程科學禮品指南在 Code Master 中，您的角色前往異國世界尋找能量水晶。在旅途中，您使用編程邏輯來導航地圖。謹慎思考，在每個關卡中，只有一個特定的動作序列才會帶來成功。一旦您收集到所有的水晶並著陸在傳送門，您就贏了！玩 Code Master 不僅教會您編程背後的原則，還能培養規劃、順序推理和解決問題的技能。類型：編程和邏輯技能：邏輯和問題解決玩家：1名玩家說明：點擊查看英文或中文特色：角色傳送門6個水晶10張地圖，共60個關卡12本指南卷軸12個動作標記8個條件標記附有解決方案的說明書

title: 思迷Robot Turtles™
body: 思迷Robot Turtles™適合小程序員的編程桌遊！年齡：4歲以上品牌：美國在中國負責製造通過玩樂強化思維思迷是世界領先的讓你上癮的有趣遊戲品牌，能夠拉伸和磨練你的思維。從啟發年輕心靈到為整個家庭帶來樂趣，我們創新的遊戲讓你在玩樂的同時思考，也讓你微笑。學齡前兒童可以通過逐個移動烏龜來學習編程。Robot Turtles只需幾秒鐘就能學會，幾分鐘就能玩，並提供無窮的學習機會。通過有趣的遊戲和編碼卡片，玩家可以將他們的Robot Turtles移動到遊戲板上的寶石。每次移動都讓學齡前兒童學習編程，從編碼到功能，並為21世紀的思維技能打下基礎。這可能是一款針對小程序員的編程桌遊，但整個家庭也會喜歡玩。類型：編程家庭初級邏輯遊戲技能：STEM創意思維玩家：2名玩家以上說明書：點擊查看英文或中文特色：遊戲板4個Robot Turtle磁磚4個寶石磁磚36個障礙磁磚4個蟲磁磚4套編碼卡片（每套44張卡）
tags: ['思迷', '編程', '遊戲', 'STEM', '小程序員', '家庭遊戲', '創意思維']

originalTitle: Brush Buddies Poppin' Leapin Louie (Frog) Toothbrush
originalBody:
Brush Buddies Poppin' Leapin Louie (Frog) Toothbrush
Brush Buddies Poppin' Louie Frog makes brushing fun! Press the belly button and the brush pops up. All 5 fun characters come with soft bristles, which are gentle on children's gums.
Features :
Soft bristles so they are gentle on your young ones teeth and gums
Flexible brush head to withstand the bending, pushing, and poppin’ action of the brush while kids play with the brush
In/Out lock: once the brush is opened it will lock in place to allow our young brushers to brush their teeth. Once they are done brushing, press the belly button, push the brush head back into the body to lock in its close position, and then place the brush head cover on top of the bristles
Drip holes: at the bottom of the character you will notice two drip holes, these were designed to let all the water drain out
Standing design: all our character can free stand on their own, eliminating toothbrush holder in the bathroom
BPA free: safety is first on our mind and we have developed all our products to be safe for your young ones
Brush head cover: each of the character's heads are fun and at the same time are a great way to protect the bristles from getting damaged as they act as a brush head cover
Benefits :
Fun animal characters that motivate kids to brush their teeth with their best pals
The poppin’ action makes it fun to brush their teeth
Watch your child enjoy brushing their teeth on their own

originalTitle: All Terrain Herbal Armour DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 8 oz. / 240ml
originalBody:
All Terrain Herbal Armour DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 8 oz. / 240ml
Safe, DEET-Free Insect Repellent, Natural
All Terrain sells effective skin protection products containing safe and clean ingredients to help people live more active, healthier lives. All Terrain’s products try to disprove the myth that if the products contain natural-based ingredients, it can’t work as well as chemical-based products. The products are developed by and for outdoor enthusiasts for use whether trekking in the backcountry or relaxing with family in your backyard.  In addition to wanting people to live healthier lives, the company is based on caring and a desire to protect the environment.
Enjoying an outdoor lifestyle comes with many benefits, but insects are not one of them! From hiking in the deep woods to lounging in the backyard, Herbal Armor DEET-free, Natural Insect Repellent is an effective and safe solution that uses a unique and extremely effective mixture of six essential oils (soybean, citronella, peppermint, cedar, lemongrass and geranium), to protect you from mosquitoes and other pesky insects, naturally. 
Keep your family safe and protected with All Terrain’s effective DEET-free insect repellent formula, while feeling good about how it is non-toxic and is not harmful to the environment. Herbal Armor Insect Repellent is perfect for active/adventurist people and families on the go.
• DEET-free
• GMO-free
• Over 26% active ingredients – among the highest 
• Uses six repelling oils – among the highest 
• Independently proven non-irritating & allergy tested
• Good for children and those with sensitive skin
• Won’t dame clothing or equipment
title: 全地形草本裝甲 DEET-FREE 驅蟲噴霧 8 盎司 / 240 毫升
body: 全地形草本裝甲 DEET-FREE 驅蟲噴霧 8 盎司 / 240 毫升安全、無 DEET 驅蟲劑、天然全地形銷售含有安全和乾淨成分的有效皮膚保護產品，幫助人們過更健康的生活。 全地形的產品試圖否定一個謬誤，即如果產品含有天然成分，就無法像化學產品一樣有效。 這些產品是由戶外愛好者開發的，供徒步旅行或在庭院裡與家人放鬆使用。 除了希望人們過更健康的生活外，該公司還以關懷和保護環境為基礎。享受戶外生活方式有許多好處，但昆蟲不是其中之一！ 從深林徒步到在後院休閒，Herbal Armor DEET-free 天然驅蟲劑是一個有效且安全的解決方案，採用獨特且極其有效的六種精油混合物（大豆、香茅、薄荷、雪松、香茅和天竺葵），自然地保護您免受蚊子和其他惱人昆蟲的侵擾。使用全地形有效的不含 DEET 驅蟲劑配方，讓您的家人安全受保護，同時對其無毒且不對環境造成危害感到自豪。 草本裝甲驅蟲劑非常適合喜歡活躍探險的人和家庭。• 不含 DEET• 不含基因改造• 超過 26% 的有效成分 - 屬於最高水平• 使用六種驅蟲精油 - 屬於最高水平• 獨立證實無刺激性和過敏性測試• 適合兒童和敏感皮膚者• 不會損壞衣物或設備主題標籤: 戶外活動, 天然產品, 環保, 驅蟲噴霧, 安全, 健康

One box contains 30ct assorted, comes in 3 sizes; 5 large size (3in. x 1in., 25mm), 10 medium size (3in. x ¾ in, 19mm.), 15 small size (2 ¼ in. x 5/8 in., 15mm).
title: 多功能野外織物創可貼 - 多色組合。
body: 多功能野外織物創可貼 - 多色組合。All Terrain銷售含有安全乾淨成分的有效護膚產品，幫助人們過上更活躍健康的生活。All Terrain的產品試圖反駁這樣的迷思，即如果產品含有天然成分，就無法像化學成分產品那樣有效。這些產品是由戶外愛好者為戶外愛好者開發的，無論是在偏遠地區徒步旅行還是在家中與家人放鬆都適用。除了希望人們過上更健康的生活外，該公司還立足於關懷和保護環境。All Terrain的織物創可貼提供柔軟的保護，無乳膠且100%無菌。它們有多種尺寸，可以適當地覆蓋小、中和大型傷口，同時對敏感皮膚溫和。織物創可貼不會引起皮膚刺激，並且對環境友好。一盒含30片多色組合，分為3個尺寸; 5片大號（3英寸x 1英寸，25mm），10片中號（3英寸x ¾英寸，19mm），15片小號（2 1/4英寸x 5/8英寸，15mm）。

originalTitle: All Terrain Waterproof Strong Strip 1" Bandages
originalBody:
All Terrain Waterproof Strong Strip 1" Bandages
All Terrain sells effective skin protection products containing safe and clean ingredients to help people live more active, healthier lives. All Terrain’s products try to disprove the myth that if the products contain natural-based ingredients, it can’t work as well as chemical-based products. The products are developed by and for outdoor enthusiasts for use whether trekking in the backcountry or relaxing with family in your backyard.  In addition to wanting people to live healthier lives, the company is based on caring and a desire to protect the environment.
All Terrain’s Waterproof Strong-Strip Bandages offer heavy-duty protection in water. With extra sticking power, they stay on longer in water while keeping wounded area super protected.
 • Heavy-duty protection with extra sticking power for use in water
• Latex-free, and 100% sterile
• Non-stick pad protects any laceration without sticking to the wound, which means pain free removal
• 20 count (3 ¼ x 1-inch each)
title: 全地形防水強力1"創口貼
body: 全地形防水強力1"創口貼全地形銷售含有安全乾淨成分的有效皮膚保護產品，幫助人們過更活躍更健康的生活。全地形的產品旨在打破一個迷思，即如果產品含有天然成分，就無法像化學產品一樣有效。這些產品由戶外愛好者開發，供徒步旅行或與家人在後院放鬆時使用。除了希望人們過更健康的生活外，這家公司還著重關懷和保護環境。全地形的防水強力創口貼在水中提供重度保護。具有額外的黏附力，可以在水中更久地保持在傷口區域，保護受傷部位。• 具有額外黏附力的重度保護，適用於水中使用• 無乳膠，100%無菌• 非粘性襯墊保護任何擦傷而不粘在傷口上，意味著無痛拆除• 20片裝（每片3 1/4 x 1英寸）

originalTitle: Annabel Karmel Organic Baby Shell Pasta Shapes
originalBody:
Annabel Karmel Organic Baby Shell Pasta Shapes
Age: 7 months +
Net Weight: 250g
Made in Italy
Allergy advice: Contains wheat and gluten. Produced in a factory handling eggs and soya.
Annabel Karmel with a career spanning over 25 years, London born mother of three, Annabel Karmel, has pioneered the way families all over the world feed their babies and children.
Credited with starting a food revolution with her trusty recipes and methods, she has become the UK’s No.1 children’s cookery author, best-selling international author, and the mother of all feeding experts with 45 cookbooks…and counting.
Made from 100% organic Semolina durum wheat, adding Annabel Karmel's organic little pasta shapes to a tasty puree or sauce helps to introduce texture and encourages babies to chew. It is also ideal for combining with meat, fish or vegetables.
Product Features:
No additives or preservatives
Added vitamin B1
Cooks in 6 minutes
Makes up to 12 meals
Only the best ingredients: organic durum wheat semolina, vitamin B1
title: 安妮寶寶有機貝殼造型麵
body: 安妮寶寶有機貝殼造型麵適合年齡：7個月以上淨重：250克製造地：意大利過敏建議：含小麥和麩質。在處理雞蛋和大豆的工廠生產。安妮寶寶憑藉超過25年的職業生涯，倫敦出生的三個孩子的母親安妮寶寶，為全球家庭改變了餵養嬰兒和兒童的方式。以她可靠的食譜和方法開啟了一場食品革命，她成為英國第一位兒童烹飪作家，最暢銷的國際作家，以及所有餵養專家的母親，擁有45本食譜書...而且還在持續增加中。由100％有機硬質小麥製成，添加安妮寶寶的有機小麵條到美味的果泥或醬料中有助於引入質地，並鼓勵嬰兒咀嚼。也適合搭配肉類、魚類或蔬菜。產品特色：無添加劑或防腐劑添加維生素B1烹煮時間為6分鐘可製作多達12餐最佳成分：有機硬質小麥粉，維生素B1

originalTitle: ECO Seal Cup Trio
originalBody:
Plastic-free and leak-proof, the Seal Cup™ Trio is a three-piece set ideal for packing a variety of foods and keeping them separate.
The containers are nesting, so you can pack up to a total of 5 cups of food in the morning and after you've eaten you can compactly tote them home by nesting each container inside the other. How nifty is that?
The non-toxic Seal Cup Trio makes your lunches greener and our oceans cleaner by keeping dangerous plastics out of your lunch and our oceans.
The Seal Cup Trio and all our Blue Water Bento collection lunch containers are designed FOR the ocean and BY the ocean. It's the beauty of our oceans that has inspired all our designs.
Product Dimensions:
 
Large container measures 4.75” diameter by 2.25” tall. Capacity is 20 oz. (2.5 cups). Tare weight is 4.4 oz.
Medium container measures 4.1” diameter by 2.1” tall. Capacity is 12 oz. (1.5 cups). Tare weight is 3.1 oz.
Small container measures 3.5” diameter by 2" tall. Capacity is 8 oz. (1 cup). Tare weight is 2.1 oz.
Product Details:
Total set capacity: 
40 oz. (5 cups)
Total set weight: 
9.6 oz.
Tare weights are etched on the bottom of each container so they may be used at food bars and delis that charge by food weight
Non-toxic silicone lid and type 304 stainless container are free of estrogen-mimicking chemicals commonly found in plastics like BPA, BPS, and phthalates
All parts are dishwasher and oven safe Not for use in the microwave
Steel and silicone container is lighter than glass containers and nonbreakable.
Made responsibly in China
title: CO密封杯三重組
body: 無塑料且防漏，密封杯™ 三重組是一套三件式的理想選擇，適合包裝各種食物並保持它們分開。這些容器是可套疊的，所以您可以在早上裝入總共5杯食物，吃完後再將它們緊密地套在一起帶回家。多麼巧妙啊！無毒的密封杯三重組通過將危險的塑料遠離您的午餐和我們的海洋，使您的午餐更環保，我們的海洋更清潔。密封杯三重組以及我們所有的藍水便當系列午餐盒均是為海洋設計且由海洋啟發而來。這就是我們所有設計的美麗所在。產品尺寸：大容器直徑4.75英寸，高2.25英寸。容量為20盎司（2.5杯）。皮重為4.4盎司。中型容器直徑4.1英寸，高2.1英寸。容量為12盎司（1.5杯）。皮重為3.1盎司。小容器直徑3.5英寸，高2英寸。容量為8盎司（1杯）。皮重為2.1盎司。產品詳情：總套容量：40盎司（5杯）總套重量：9.6盎司容器底部刻有皮重，可以在按食物重量收費的自助餐吧和熟食店中使用無毒矽膠蓋和304不銹鋼容器不含常見於塑料中的模仿雌激素的化學物質，如BPA、BPS和鄰苯二甲酸酯所有部件均可放入洗碗機和烤箱，不適用於微波爐鋼和矽膠容器比玻璃容器更輕，且不易破碎在中國負責任地製造
tags: ['ECO午餐盒', '容器', 'ECO', '環保', '健康', '海洋']

originalTitle: ECO 3-in-1 Splash Box
originalBody:
With its 
modular design
 and 
leak-proof lids
, the 
3-in-1 Splash Box
 is a three-piece set that stacks and nests. It’s a powerful plastic-free lunchtime tool that has been designed as a 2.0 remix of our best selling ECOlunchbox 3-in-1 and Blue Water Bento Splash Box
We think you’ll love the 
space-saving design
 featuring three food compartments, including upstairs and downstairs sections as well as a nesting snack container called the Mini Splash Pod, which tucks inside the top layer. Plus, what’s not to love about no-leak lids?
This 
plastic-free lunch
 packer has it all when it comes to convenience. Holding 4 cups of food, it straps together with a wavy silicone band that attaches to a wave-shaped latch. The nubby waves on the strap are non-slip and easy to use for all ages.
title: CO 3合1濺水盒
body: 憑藉其模塊化設計和防漏蓋，3合1濺水盒是一套三件式堆疊和套裝的工具。這是一款強大的無塑料午餐工具，設計為我們最暢銷的ECOlunchbox 3合1和藍水曲奇濺水盒的2.0版本。我們認為您會喜歡這款節省空間的設計，包括三個食物隔層，包括樓上和樓下的部分，以及一個名為Mini Splash Pod的套裝零食容器，可藏在頂層內。另外，無漏蓋又有什麼不喜歡的呢？這款無塑料午餐盒在便利性方面擁有一切。容量為4杯食物，帶有波浪狀矽膠帶，可固定在波浪形扣上。帶子上的突起波浪防滑且容易使用，適合各個年齡段的人使用。

originalTitle: ECO Oval & Snack Cup
originalBody:
ECO Oval & Snack Cup is a durable container and no-leak cup set. The modular lunchbox is designed to keep your lunch and your sides fresh - all while using non-toxic, sustainable materials. This lunchbox kit is perfect as a bento lunchbox, for salads, or for storing lunch dishes with multiple wet and dry ingredients.
This 2-piece lunch container set includes a large oval container plus a smaller cup with ECO Oval & Snack Cup
 
that's ideal for sauces, dips or other wet foods.
Go plastic-free with our ECOlunchbox Oval, a
 
durable, reusable, toxin-free, lunch container set
 
for your lunches. The large oval lunchbox measures 6 1/2 inches long by 5 inches wide and 2 inches tall fitting up to 3 cups of food. 
The accompanying
 cup fits 1 cup of food!
Product Details:
2 piece set includes oval lunchbox and leak-proof cup, which can either be packed separately or inside the larger lunchbox.
Total capacity 30 oz (3.75 cups).
Tare Weight: 16 oz. 
Great for portion control. Oval lunchbox capacity is 24 oz (3 cups). No-leak cup capacity is 6 oz (.75 cup).
Oval lunchbox measures 6.5" long x 5" wide x 2" tall. Cup measures 1.5" tall x 3.25" diameter.
Made of Stainless Steel 304
Cup lid is made of non-toxic, food grade silicone. 
Dishwasher safe.
Not for use in the microwave. Food may be reheated in the metal containers in a medium-heat oven or over a camp stove.
title: ECO橢圓形便當盒與零食杯
body: ECO橢圓形便當盒與零食杯是一組耐用的容器和不漏水的杯子。這款模塊化便當盒設計用來保持您的便當和配菜新鮮 - 同時使用無毒、可持續的材料。這款便當盒套裝非常適合作為便當盒、沙拉盒，或用來存放多種濕潤和乾燥成分的便當菜餚。這套2件裝便當盒包括一個大橢圓形容器和一個小杯子，非常適合裝醬料、沾醬或其他濕潤食物。ECO橢圓形便當盒採用耐用、可重複使用、無毒的材料，讓您的午餐更環保。大橢圓形便當盒尺寸為6.5英寸長、5英寬、2英寸高，可容納3杯食物。配套的杯子可容納1杯食物。產品詳情：2件套包括橢圓形便當盒和防漏杯，可單獨包裝或放在大便當盒內。總容量30盎司（3.75杯）。皮重：16盎司。非常適合控制食量。橢圓形便當盒容量為24盎司（3杯）。不漏水杯容量為6盎司（0.75杯）。橢圓形便當盒尺寸為6.5英寸長×5英寬×2英寸高。杯子尺寸為1.5英寸高×3.25英寸直徑。採用304不鏽鋼製成。杯蓋採用無毒食品級矽膠製成。可放入洗碗機清洗。不適用於微波爐。食物可在中火炉或露營爐中加熱金屬容器。
tags: ['ECO便當盒', '容器', 'ECO', '可持續材料']

originalTitle: ECO Three-in-One Classic
originalBody:
The bestselling ECO Three-in-One Classic is a
 
three-piece nesting bento lunch box
 set. This nifty bento container makes it easy to pack a variety of foods and keep them all separate - and safe from squishing! Our Three-in-One is perfect packing a healthy entree and two side dishes. Not only is it 100% stainless steel and plastic-free, but it has a modular design with compartments for a full course meal!
 
Product Details:
Durable design uses 100% food-grade
 
stainless steel
 201.
3 piece nesting bento set. Includes upper and lower food containers plus a snack container.
Three different sections keep food from touching and mixing. Also works great for
 
portion control
.
31 oz capacity (3.8 cups) Total. Bottom section: 12 oz capacity (1.5 cups). Top section: 14 oz capacity (1.75 cups). Snack container: 5 oz capacity (.75 cup)
Measures 4" wide x 5.5" long x 2.75" high
Tare Weight: 16 oz
Non-toxic: free of estrogen-mimicking toxins commonly found in plastic, such as BPA (bisphenol-A), BPS (bisphenol-S) and phthalates
Kid-tested clips can be adjusted looser or tighter.
Container is
 
not leak-proof
 
since no plastic gaskets are used. If you need to pack something wet in the top layer, such as dressings or dips. 
Dishwasher safe. Not for use in microwave.

title: 環保三合一經典餐盒
body: 熱銷的環保三合一經典餐盒是一套三件式的疊疊樂便當盒。這款巧妙的便當盒容器讓您可以輕鬆地裝各種食物，並將它們分開保存，不會被壓扁！我們的三合一餐盒非常適合裝一份健康主菜和兩道配菜。它不僅是100%不鏽鋼和無塑料，還具有模塊化設計，配有用於全餐的隔層！商品詳情：堅固的設計採用100%食品級不銹鋼201。三件套疊疊樂套裝。包括上下食物容器和一個零食盒。三個不同區域使食物不會接觸和混合。同時非常適合控制飲食份量。容量31盎司（3.8杯）總計。底部部分：12盎司容量（1.5杯）。頂部部分：14盎司容量（1.75杯）。零食盒：5盎司容量（0.75杯）尺寸為4英寸寬x 5.5英寸長x 2.75英寸高皮重：16盎司無毒：不含常見於塑料中的激素擬態毒素，如BPA（雙酚A），BPS（雙酚S）和鄰苯二甲酸鹽經過兒童測試的夾子可調節鬆緊。由於不使用塑料墊圈，容器不防漏。如果需要在頂層包裝濕潤食物，如醬汁或沾醬。可洗碗機清洗。不可放入微波爐使用。印度製造。
tags: ['ECO午餐盒', '容器', '環保', '健康餐盒', '不鏽鋼']

originalTitle: ECO Three-in-One Giant
originalBody:
Do you have a giant lunchtime appetite? 
A 100% stainless steel bento box, the ECO Three-in-One Giant, holds an impressive 8 cups of food in three separate food containers that nest and clip together.
The Giant, which is the largest bento in the ECOlunchbox collection, is an amazing piece planet-friendly, non-toxic lunch hardware designed to handle generous portion sizes. Twice the size of ECO Three-in-One Classic, with same great quality. 
Product Details
Rugged, large size stainless steel lunchbox is non-toxic, plastic-free and waste-free.
3 sections to keep food separated.
When clipped closed, the Giant measures all together 5 1/4 inches wide, 7 inches long and 3 inches high. 
The upper and lower levels of the two-tiered bento each hold 3.5 cups (28 oz). The top layer is 1.75 inches deep and sits on top of the bottom layer, which is 1.25 inches deep.
The rectangular nesting container with lid measures 2 1/2 inches wide by 4 3/4 inches long by 1 5/8 inches high (interior dimension is 1.5 inches) and holds 1 cup. This container can be either packed separately or tucked in the top level of the metal lunchbox.
The clips can be adjusted to desired stiffness. 
The Three-in-One Giant is not leak proof. Damp foods, such as cut fruit, hummus and other thick sauces, work well in our containers. Our lids don't have any plastic gaskets or other added synthetics to create a seal. Therefore, sauces and liquids may leak.
Not for use in the microwave. Food may be reheated in the metal containers in a medium-heat oven or over a campstove. Try our pot gripper for easy handling!
Dishwasher safe.
Made in India.
title: ECO三合一巨型餐盒
body: 你是不是有個大胃口的午餐時間？ECO三合一巨型餐盒是一款100%不鏽鋼製成的便當盒，可分成三個獨立的食物容器，並可以嵌套並夾在一起，可容納高達8杯的食物。巨型餐盒是ECOlunchbox系列中最大的便當盒，是一件非常棒的環保、無毒午餐器具，設計用來裝大份量的食物。比ECO三合一經典款大一倍，但品質同樣出色。產品詳情堅固耐用，巨型不鏽鋼午餐盒無毒、無塑料、無廢棄物。有3個區域可以放不同食物。合上夾子後，巨型餐盒整體尺寸為寬5 1/4英寸、長7英寸和高3英寸。雙層便當的上下層各可容納3.5杯（28盎司）。頂層深度為1.75英寸，放在底層上，底層深度為1.25英寸。帶蓋子的矩形嵌套容器尺寸為寬2 1/2英寸、長4 3/4英寸、高1 5/8英寸（內部尺寸為1.5英寸），可容納1杯食物。這個容器可以單獨裝好或放在金屬午餐盒的頂層。夾子可以調節到所需的堅硬度。三合一巨型餐盒不防漏。濕潤的食物，如切好的水果、鷹嘴豆泥和其他濃稠的醬料，在我們的容器中表現良好。我們的蓋子沒有任何塑料墊圈或其他添加的合成物質來創建密封。因此，醬料和液體可能會滲漏。不適用於微波爐。食物可以在金屬容器中用中火烤箱或露營爐中加熱。使用我們的鍋夾來方便操作！可放入洗碗機清洗。印度製造。
tags: ['ECO午餐盒', '容器', 'ECO', '不鏽鋼', '無毒', '環保']

originalTitle: ECO Tri Bento
originalBody:
ECO Tri Bento - 100% Stainless Steel
Stacking and packing a healthy lunch is as easy at 1-2-3 with the elegant ECOlunchbox Tri Bento that's made up of
 
three separate layers which neatly clip together
. 
Each lunch container in the stacking Tri Bento metal lunchbox set is made from non-toxic stainless steel and is portioned for a healthy lunch or snack.
The shape of the Tri Bento lunchbox is classic of the round stainless steel "tiffins" that have been used for generations throughout India. The Tri Bento metal lunchbox, however, is a stand-out due to the exceptional quality of the workmanship as well as the
 
easy-to-use clips
 
that won't pinch. It's the perfect lunchbox for packing a trio of your favorite lunch foods! 
Because all ECOlunchbox lunch containers are made from durable, reusable materials, you can reduce your impact on the planet all while enjoying perfectly-portioned, fresh meals on-the-go.
title: CO 三層便當盒
body: ECO 三層便當盒 - 100% 不銹鋼用優雅的ECOlunchbox三層便當盒堆疊和打包健康午餐就像1-2-3一樣簡單，由三個分離的層組成，可以整齊地鉤在一起。每個ECOlunchbox Tri Bento套裝便當盒中的午餐盒都由無毒不鏽鋼製成，份量適合健康的午餐或小吃。Tri Bento便當盒的形狀是印度各地幾代人用過的經典圓形不銹鋼"鐵缽"。不過，Tri Bento不銹鋼便當盒因其出色的工藝質量以及不會夾住的易於使用的夾具而脫穎而出。這是一個完美的便當盒，可以裝載您最喜愛的三種午餐食品！由於所有ECOlunchbox午餐盒都是由耐用的可重複使用材料製成，您可以減少對地球的影響，同時在外出時享受份量恰到好處、新鮮的餐點。
tags: ['ECO 便當盒', '容器', 'ECO', '環保', '不銹鋼']

originalTitle: ECO Solo Rectangle
originalBody:
ECO Solo Rectangle has the largest single-compartment of all our stainless steel food containers. This 100% steel lunchbox is a durable piece of hardware designed for longtime use at lunchtime as well as in the great outdoors for camping, boating, picnicking, and other on-the-go activities.
Product Details:
Stainless steel rectangular container with a lid
Container measures 4.75" wide x 6.75" long x 2" tall
Contains 29 oz (3.6 cups)
Tare Weight: 8 oz
Great for portion control & mindful eating
Non-toxic: free of estrogen-mimicking toxins commonly found in plastic, such as BPA (bisphenol-A), BPS (bisphenol-S) and phthalates
Stainless Steel 201
Dishwasher safe
Not for use in the microwave. Food may be reheated in the metal containers in a medium-heat oven or over a camp stove. Try out our pot gripper for easy handling. 
Not leak proof
Made in India
title: CO Solo Rectangle
body: ECO Solo Rectangle是我們所有不鏽鋼食物容器中最大的單個隔間。這款100%鋼製午餐盒是一件耐用的硬件，旨在長時間在午餐時間以及在戶外進行露營、划船、野餐和其他便攜活動中使用。商品詳情：帶蓋的不鏽鋼長方形容器容器尺寸為4.75英寬 x 6.75英長 x 2英高容量為29盎司（3.6杯）皮重：8盎司非常適合控制食量和注意飲食無毒：不含常見於塑料中的擬雌激素毒素，如BPA（雙酚A）、BPS（雙酚S）和邻苯二甲酸酯不銹鋼201可放入洗碗機清洗不適用於微波爐。食物可以在金屬容器中在中火烤箱或露營爐上重新加熱。試試我們的鍋夾，方便攜帶。不防漏印度製造

title: 小鈴鈴 迷你薑餅人
body: 小鈴鈴 迷你薑餅人適合年齡：12個月以上品牌：澳大利亞製造地：德國迷人的全穀薑餅人餅乾，可以平息肚子的饑腸轆轆。我們使用葡萄汁濃縮液，而非蔗糖，給予微甜的口感，使這些餅乾脆脆的，正如餅乾應該有的樣子。成分：有機全穀小麥麵粉（31%）、有機小麥麵粉、有機葡萄汁濃縮液（29%）、有機可持續棕櫚油、有機向日葵油、有機薑（0.3%）、膨脹劑（碳酸氫鈉）。含有麩質。可能含有蛋、牛奶、大豆和樹果的痕跡。請存放在陰涼乾燥的地方。打開後為保持新鮮度，請存放在密封容器內。有機全穀小麥薑餅人餅乾（新包裝 130克）有趣的薑餅人餅乾，是寶寶愉快的零食。甜味來自有機葡萄汁，讓寶寶接觸天然甜味。口感香脆，入口即化。開封後請保持新鮮，存放在密封容器中。適合12個月或以上。新增主題標籤: 零食,甜點,有機食品,寶寶食品,全穀食品,小麥製品

originalTitle: Woobamboo Toothbrush Adult Soft
originalBody:
Woobamboo Toothbrush Adult Soft
Brand: Woobamboo
Made responsibly in China (where it is bamboo rich!)
A bamboo toothbrush is a fantastic alternative to the typical plastic or nylon toothbrush – of which over 2 BILLION end up in the world’s landfills every year. The bamboo used in our brushes is sustainably grown, organic, BPA-free, naturally anti-microbial, durable, biodegradable, and hey- it’s stylish, too! WooBamboo also totes the highest quality Dupont Tynex bristles, so your 
dentist would approve, as well.
The only thing standard about our Standard Adult Toothbrushes is the routine of brushing twice a day. Our beautiful bamboo handle provides a wavy grip that sits in the curve of your palm and offers a natural place for your thumb. A very light coating of Chinese white wax coupled with the already anti-microbial nature of bamboo assures you that not only are you doing something healthy for your mouth, but that you are not harvesting a germ fest on the handle. We offer three bristle strengths in beautiful colors to add “pop” to your bathroom counter top. Bamboo and you. It’s a winning combination.
title: Woobamboo 成人軟毛竹牙刷
body: Woobamboo 成人軟毛竹牙刷品牌: Woobamboo在中國負責負責生產（中國有豐富的竹資源！）竹製牙刷是一個很棒的替代品，相較於每年超過20億支以塑膠或尼龍製成的牙刷最終填滿世界垃圾場。我們牙刷中使用的竹子是可持續種植、有機、不含BPA、天然抗菌、耐用、可生物降解，而且時尚！Woobamboo 還擁有最高品質的杜邦 Tynex 刷毛，因此您的牙醫會贊成的。我們的標準成人牙刷唯一標準的事情是每天刷牙兩次的習慣。我們美麗的竹柄提供了波浪狀握把，適合掌心彎曲位置，手指有自然的地方放置。中國白蠟的輕微塗層，再加上竹的天然抗菌特性，保證您不僅為口腔健康做了點事，而且沒有在柄上製造細菌滋生地。我們提供三種顏色的刷毛強度，為您的浴室櫥櫃增添“亮點”。竹和您。這是一個勝利的組合。

originalTitle: Woobamboo Toothbrush Slim Soft
originalBody:
Woobamboo Toothbrush Slim Soft
Brand: Woobamboo
Made responsibly in China (where it is bamboo rich!)
A bamboo toothbrush is a fantastic alternative to the typical plastic or nylon toothbrush – of which over 2 BILLION end up in the world’s landfills every year. The bamboo used in our brushes is sustainably grown, organic, BPA-free, naturally anti-microbial, durable, biodegradable, and hey- it’s stylish, too! WooBamboo also totes the highest quality Dupont Tynex bristles, so your dentist would approve, as well.
What’s up, Slim? Ever been called that in high school? Well, now you’ve graduated and your toothbrush has taken your superlative. “Slim – Most Popular With the Ladies”. This is so true with our Slim Adult Toothbrushes. Women and teens seem to ‘lean’ towards the sleek, straight look of this streamline, bamboo handle. The grip is a bit smaller than its Standard Adult sibling and instead of four rows of bristles, there are three! And just like our full line of toothbrushes, there’s a lot to be said about going natural. Let it start with your toothbrush. We’ll talk about your roots later.

originalTitle: Woobamboo Biodegradable Eco Floss Mint 37.5m
originalBody:
Woobamboo Biodegradable Eco Floss Mint 37.5m
Okay, so let’s discuss the elephant in the room: flossing doesn’t necessarily sit at the cool table with oh, say the
 
hot toothbrush
 
or the
 
hunky mouthwash
. But that doesn’t make our buddy floss any less important. It’s actually incredibly important, as it helps get all that funk out from in between your teeth. BUT THEN WHAT? Every time it’s used that means another several feet (usually) of non-biodegradable plastic string ends up in the garbage! You don’t have to be president of the environmental club to imagine what thousands of miles of plastic floss in oceans and landfills can do to our planet’s animal inhabitants.
SO GO NATURAL, BABY!
Our dental floss is made from natural organic silk, and it’s encased in a cool, plant-based plastic shell. We’ve eliminated the need for a plastic case, as the packaging itself becomes your floss dispenser! Pop it open, thread it, close it, use it.  Oh, stick “buy it” in there, first. 🙂 If you want to order our products in bulk or wholesale, we can help you with that too!
 
Made with natural, biodegradable silk
 
Coated with natural wax
 
Packaged in renewable plant-based plastic
 
Soy-based ink & post-consumer waste
 
Finely crafted in Italy
title: Woobamboo 生物分解環保薄荷牙線 37.5m
body: Woobamboo 生物分解環保薄荷牙線 37.5m好吧，讓我們來討論房間裡的大象：牙線並不一定像那些熱門的牙刷或者帥氣的漱口水那樣被視為酷。但這並不會使我們的好朋友牙線變得不重要。事實上，它非常重要，因為它有助於清除牙齒間的所有不良物質。但之後呢？每次使用牙線，這意味著又有幾英尺（通常）的不可生物降解塑料線最終被丟進垃圾桶！你不必成為環保俱樂部的主席，也能想像數千英里的塑料牙線在海洋和垃圾填埋場中對我們星球的動物居民造成了什麼樣的影響。所以，走自然路線，寶貝！我們的牙線是由天然有機絲制成，並包裹在一個時尚的植物基塑料外殼中。我們消除了塑料盒的需求，因為包裝本身就成為了你的牙線分配器！打開它，穿線，關上，使用。哦，首先加上“購買”這一步 🙂 如果您想批量或批發訂購我們的產品，我們也可以幫助您！- 采用天然、可生物降解的絲線製成- 表面塗有天然蠟- 索取於可再生植物基塑料- 大豆墨水和後消費廢物- 在意大利精心製作

originalTitle: Hollywood Fashion Tape
originalBody:

If irritation or redness occurs, discontinue use. Do not apply to irritated, sunburned or sensitive skin. Pretest for sensitivity or allergies.
title: 好萊塢時尚膠帶
body: 透過36條易於使用的清晰雙面膠帶，將服裝和配件固定在原位，這些「萬能」的服裝和身體膠帶可以解決各種緊急狀況！這些事先裁剪的3英寸一次性膠帶以拯救全球女性避免衣櫥故障而聞名。好萊塢時尚膠帶的特殊配方膠黏劑對皮膚溫和，低過敏性，並且不會在皮膚上留下任何殘留物。撕掉背膠紙，將其牢固地按壓在乾淨、無油的皮膚或布料上。撕掉剩餘的背膠紙，然後貼在要固定的物品上。在清洗、乾洗或熨燙服裝之前請先撕掉膠帶。預先測試面料。如果出現刺激或紅腫，請停止使用。不要貼在有刺激、曬傷或敏感皮膚上。請先測試是否對面料敏感或過敏。
tags: ['好萊塢', '時尚', '服裝保護', '服裝配件', '服裝解決方案', '服裝維護', '服裝貼片']

originalTitle: Paw Patrol TropiFruit Drink (3x200ml)
originalBody:
Paw Patrol TropiFruit Drink (3x200ml)
A wonderfully blended range of juices using all but natural ingredients to make a drink that is loved by the little ones and big ones alike. Keep the little ones happy with their favourite characters on their tasty drink boxes. With the additional use of natural stevia as a natural sweetener the drinks pack less sugar than many other brands.
Ingredients:
water, fruit juices (50%) made from concentrates (apple, orange, passion fruit) and purees (peach and apricot), acidity regulator (citric acid), natural mango and passion fruit flavourings, sweetener (steviol glycosides).
title: 寵物狗特洛皮果汁飲料（3x200毫升）
body: 寵物狗特洛皮果汁飲料（3x200毫升）以全天然成分精心混合的果汁系列，製成一款小朋友和大人都喜愛的飲料。讓小朋友開心，他們最喜歡的角色出現在美味的飲料盒上。在使用天然甜菊素作為天然甜味劑的補充下，這些飲料含糖量比許多其他品牌少。成分：水，果汁（50％）由濃縮果汁（蘋果，橙，百香果）和純果泥（桃子和杏子）製成，酸度調節劑（檸檬酸），天然芒果和百香果香料，甜味劑（甜菊苷）。

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO Diapers / 無敏環保紙尿片 Size-3 (S) 33pc
originalBody:
6 packs per case / 
每
箱6
包
Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO disposable diapers are gentle to the child’s skin and health and have a very soft textile-like back and top sheet that makes the diaper feel like soft clothing. The diaper is designed to fit a child’s anatomy perfectly, which ensures there is no leakage and makes the child feel comfortable while enabling greater freedom of movement.
Our disposable baby diapers are among the most environment-friendly diapers on the market. They are manufactured with care for the environment, and 95 % of all waste coming from the production of Bambo Nature is recycled. Furthermore, the diapers are labeled with the Nordic Eco-label, the FSC®-label, the Asthma Allergy label and are Dermatologically Tested.
Bambo Nature are proud to present all the certifications to ensure all mothers that their babies skin will be free from all the harmful chemicals. We can guarantee that!

originalTitle: All Terrain Kids Herbal Armor DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 2 oz.  / 60ml
originalBody:
All Terrain Kids Herbal Armor DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 2 oz.  / 60ml
Safe, DEET-Free, Natural Insect Repellent
All Terrain sells effective skin protection products containing safe and clean ingredients to help people live more active, healthier lives. All Terrain’s products try to disprove the myth that if the products contain natural-based ingredients, it can’t work as well as chemical-based products. The products are developed by and for outdoor enthusiasts for use whether trekking in the backcountry or relaxing with family in your backyard.  In addition to wanting people to live healthier lives, the company is based on caring and a desire to protect the environment.
Enjoying an outdoor lifestyle comes with many benefits, but insects are not one of them! From hiking in the deep woods to lounging in the backyard, Herbal Armor DEET-free, Natural Insect Repellent travel-size is an effective and safe solution that uses a unique and extremely effective mixture of six essential oils (soybean, citronella, peppermint, cedar, lemongrass and geranium), to protect you from mosquitoes and other pesky insects, naturally. 
Keep your family safe and protected with All Terrain’s effective DEET-free insect repellent formula, while feeling good about how it is non-toxic and is not harmful to the environment. Herbal Armor Insect Repellent is perfect for active/adventurist people and families on the go.
• DEET-free
• GMO-free
• Over 26% active ingredients – among the highest 
• Uses six repelling oils – among the highest 
• Independently proven non-irritating & allergy tested
• Good for children and those with sensitive skin
• Won’t dame clothing or equipment
• Travel-size

body: 為敏感肌膚和頭皮設計，洗沐寶貝洗髮沐浴露為您的寶寶和整個家庭提供最佳的濕潤和滋養。洗沐寶貝經過過敏測試，不含香料、對羥基苯甲酸酯或染料，從而降低過敏反應的風險。我們的純素洗劑含有天然和有機成分，可以溫和安全地清潔您的寶寶。而且由於我們的洗劑對眼睛溫和，沐浴時間將會是一個愉快的時光。水，蘆薈葉提取物*，椰子硫酸鈉，椰基葡糖苷，甘油*，海鹽，檸檬酸，苯甲酸鈉*有機農業成分為敏感肌膚和頭皮設計，為您寶寶的皮膚和頭髮提供最佳的清潔和滋潤。該產品經過過敏測試，不含香料，防腐劑或染料，以降低過敏反應的風險。我們的純素洗劑含有天然和有機成分，可以溫和安全地清潔您的寶寶。本產品溫和不刺激眼睛，讓寶寶享受整個沐浴過程。

title: 竹愛天然舒緩護膚霜 100毫升
body: 我們的舒緩護膚霜有助於保護您寶寶的皮膚免受過多濕氣的影響。它在皮膚上形成透氣的保護屏障，讓皮膚保持柔軟、光滑和滋養。愛護護膚霜含有天然和有機成分，是純素的，經過皮膚科醫生測試並獲得生態認證。水，椰子油*，蘆薈葉提取物*，辛酸/癸酸甘油三酯，乳木果油*，甘油，聚甘油二聚羥基硬脂酸酯，玉米澱粉*，杏仁油*，聚甘油三異硬脂酸酯，氫化蓖麻油，硫酸鎂，樂味酸，對甲氧基苯甲酸，左旋檸檬酸鈉，植酸，氫氧化鈉*有機農業成分這款舒緩護膚霜有助於保護您寶寶的皮膚免受過多濕氣的侵害。它在皮膚上形成透氣的保護屏障，讓皮膚保持柔軟、光滑和滋養。含有天然和有機成分，經過純素人士、皮膚科醫生和生態認證的測試。

originalTitle: Abena Maternity Pads 14pcs
originalBody:
Abena´s Maternity Pads is a part of the Abena anatomically shaped range for mothers. Designed for light to heavy degrees of postnatal incontinence, Abena Maternity Pads will facilitate the postnatal phase so that you can concentrate of what really matters, your newborn child.
Abena Maternity Pads cover light to moderate incontinence. The product offers a unique protection against leakage with super soft and flat lengthwise barriers. It can be fixed via the use of the self-adhesive strips on the back of the pad. It has Abena’s Top Dry system, that allows the user to feel dry and comfortable, while letting the skin breathe.
   Optimum comfort and discretion
    Cotton – feel, fully breathable backsheet foil.
    Soft and reliable flat lengthwise side barriers
    Unique TopDry system, providing a dry surface and rapid absorption
    Odor system, minimizing any unpleasant smell
    Nordic Eco-Label
    Dermatologically tested
    FSC certified
    Latex-free and non-chlorine bleached
Designed specifically for postpartum urinary incontinence, it will promote the postpartum stage and make mothers feel relieved to focus on precious newborns. ​
Suitable for mild to moderate urinary incontinence. ​The product has a unique anti-leakage protection function, with a super soft and flat longitudinal barrier. ​It can be fixed by using the self-adhesive strip on the back of the pad. The top drying system allows users to feel dry and comfortable while allowing the skin to breathe.
Each mother uses an average of 40-50 yuan after delivery.
Optimal comfort and protection

Soft and reliable flat longitudinal sidewall
Unique TopDry system provides a dry surface and fast absorption
Reduce any unpleasant odors

Free of latex and non-chlorinated bleach
title: Abena孕婦衛生棉 14片裝
body: Abena的孕婦衛生棉是Abena為媽媽們設計的一部分，屬於Anatomically Shaped系列。專為輕度至重度產後尿失禁而設計，Abena孕婦衛生棉將有助於過渡產後期，讓您專注於真正重要的事情，您的新生兒。Abena孕婦衛生棉適用於輕度至中度尿失禁。該產品具有超柔軟且平整的縱向阻擋功能，可提供獨特的防漏保護。可通過衛生棉背面的自粘條固定。具有Abena的Top Dry系統，讓使用者感到乾爽舒適，同時讓皮膚呼吸。最佳舒適性和隱私保護棉質全透氣背膜，質感如棉柔軟可靠的平整縱向阻擋邊緣獨特的TopDry系統，提供乾爽表面和快速吸收消除任何不愉快的氣味北歐環保標籤經皮膚測試FSC認證不含乳膠，非氯漂白專為產後尿失禁而設計，有助於促進產後階段，使媽媽們感到放心專注於珍貴的新生兒。適用於輕度至中度尿失禁。該產品具有獨特的防漏保護功能，具有超柔軟且平整的縱向阻擋。可通過使用衛生棉背面的自粘條固定。頂部乾燥系統可讓使用者感到乾爽舒適，同時讓皮膚呼吸。每位媽媽產後平均使用40-50片。最佳舒適性和保護棉質全透氣，乾爽舒適柔軟可靠的平整縱向側壁獨特的TopDry系統提供乾爽表面和快速吸收減少任何不愉快的氣味北歐白天鵝生態標籤通過FSC認證不含乳膠和非氯漂白

originalTitle: Sassy Fish Fasincation Station
originalBody:
Sassy Fish Fasincation Station
Age: 6 months +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
Use the suction cup base to attach the station to a flat surface and watch baby explore the many features of this station. The spinning wheel encourages baby to reach, tug and bat, strengthening hand-eye coordination. Each feature on the wheel spins individually when baby bats at it, introducing baby to cause & effect. The colorful beads trapped within the clear structures allow baby to connect the sound to sight. The toy’s handle is multi-textured, perfect for mouthing. This 2-in-1 toy can be suctioned to a table or high chair tray, or removed from the base for floor play.

originalTitle: ThinkFun Hacker
originalBody:
ThinkFun Hacker
To beat a Hacker, you have to think like one.
Age: 10 yrs +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
 
Empowering Minds Through Play
ThinkFun is the world’s leader in addictively fun games that stretch and sharpen your mind. From lighting up young minds to creating fun for the whole family, our innovative games make you think while they make you smile.
Mensa Mind Games Finalist – 2019
Can you outsmart cybercriminals? Defend the world from cybercriminals by joining the white hat hacker team Oblivion! Play the role of a coder, hacker, and security engineer in 40 beginner to expert challenges. Program your agents to collect data chips while avoiding viruses and alarms. As you discover how a hacker can damage your programs, you will learn how to secure them from future attacks! Each of the 40 challenges includes three phases of play for a total of 120 coding puzzles. Teaches: CONCURRENCY and SECURITY MINDSET

title: 智趣駭客
body: 智趣駭客要打敗一個駭客，你必須像一個駭客一樣思考。年齡：10歲以上品牌：美國在中國負責製造透過遊戲賦予力量智趣是全球領先的讓你沉迷的有趣遊戲，可以拉伸和磨練你的思維。從啟發年輕思想到為整個家庭創造樂趣，我們創新的遊戲讓你在娛樂中思考。Mensa Mind Games決賽入圍者 - 2019年你能比智慧犯罪者更聰明嗎？通過加入白帽駭客團隊Oblivion來捍衛世界免受網路罪犯攻擊！在40個從初學者到專家的挑戰中扮演編碼師、駭客和安全工程師的角色。程式化你的特工來收集數據芯片，同時避開病毒和警報。當你發現駭客如何損壞你的程式時，你將學會如何保護它們免受未來的攻擊！每個40個挑戰都包括三個階段的遊玩，總共有120個編碼謎題。教授：並行性和安全意識類型：邏輯遊戲 編碼 家庭技能：邏輯問題解決 STEM 創意思維 視覺知覺玩家：1名玩家以上說明：點擊查看英文或中文特色：遊戲網格控制面板挑戰手冊解答手冊12個代幣27個遊戲方塊說明書6個代幣架

body: Clarisan 500ml 手部消毒凝膠 - 方形瓶裝（一箱）品牌：Clarisan英國製造CLARISAN酒精凝膠是一款快速作用的抗菌手部消毒劑。非常有效，無香料，此酒精凝膠能快速殺滅99.9％所有常見細菌，包括MRSA，大腸桿菌和沙門氏菌！無香料配方還添加了蘆薈，以防止皮膚乾燥。• 口袋大小• 使用方便• 尺寸適中，不會太快用完• 高效殺滅最常見有害細菌備註：每箱12瓶

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free Eco Training Pants Size-4 (L) 20pcs 7-14KG
originalBody:
5 packs per case / 每箱5包
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
7-14KG / 17-31LBS
 
Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-4, L, 7-14 Kg, 20 pcs/pack
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner designImprove moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
 The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
SofterUse better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, which keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants 
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.
title: Bambo Nature 零敏感環保訓練褲 Size-4 (L) 20片 7-14KG
body: 每箱5包Bambo Nature 的零敏感環保一次性訓練褲不含有害化學物質和所有已知過敏原。這些訓練褲旨在讓孩子更容易學習上廁所。您的幼兒將感覺像個大孩子，因為我們的訓練褲採用柔軟、薄和易拉上拉下的設計。我們的訓練褲採用三層設計，具有超吸收的核心，即使在夜間也能應對多次潮濕。和我們的尿布一樣，Bambo Nature 訓練褲擁有全透氣的背片，保持嬌嫩皮膚乾燥。7-14KG / 17-31磅丹麥無致敏環保嬰兒學習褲，Size-4，L，7-14公斤，20片/包全新升級功能！濕度指示器開發出市場上最佳和最高品質的濕度顯示器。100%不含有害化學物質和過敏原。液體敏感條會變色以指示濕度。更薄的設計改進了濕度吸收技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。學習褲更薄，更舒適，而不會影響吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好、更柔軟的材料增強舒適度和保護。Bambo Nature Dream 的改進功能帶來了一種更清新、更舒適的體驗，保持乾爽，減少濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature 的北歐白天鵝環保標籤證實了我們在環保方面的努力。為獲得此標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格標準，其中包括：我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表示我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉來自可持續林業。這裡需要種植更多的樹木以取代使用的樹木。與此同時，我們的產品也通過了不同獨立機構的測試，確保Bambo Nature 的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。為了配合孩子的如廁訓練，Bambo Nature 訓練褲的設計使他們可以輕鬆拉上拉下。此外，如果需要，訓練褲也可以從側面打開。Bambo Nature 訓練褲的優勢· 這種環保尿布絕對是孩子學習如廁的好幫手· 不含氯、螢光劑和護膚劑· 學習褲中的木漿和棉花都來自自由可持續林業· 腰圍和腳圍不含乳膠· 不含氯漂白劑· 透氣背墊可讓孩子的皮膚呼吸，避免皮膚敏感。

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Biodegradable Wet Wipes 50 counts
originalBody:
Bambo Nature Biodegradable Wet Wipes are a must-have for every baby changing table, diaper bag, handbag, road trip, picnic, sleepover – everywhere you and your baby go. Our skin-friendly, moisturizing cleaning wipes are made from soft, sustainable 100% viscose, which means that they do not contain plastic and are a better alternative for the environment. The wipes are dermatologically tested and contain no perfume or color.
Good alternative to water and soap and can be used on the entire body. The wipes are Vegan and do not contain ingredients of animal origin, only natural and organic plant-derived ingredients. Certified according to the standards of the Nordic Swan Ecolabel and Asthma Allergy Nordic – the sustainable and safe choice for your baby and the environment.
Recommended use: Will clean up almost anything, anytime, anywhere. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
Biodegradable (no plastic)
Gentle and soft
Skin-friendly (no perfume or color)
New packaging reducing plastic in both lid & foil
100% Biodegradable is biodegradable!
Bambo Nature wet wipes are essential items for every baby changing table, diaper bag, tote bag, road trip, picnic, and overnight outing. You can use it wherever you and your baby go.
Our skin-friendly moisturizing cleansing wipes are made of soft, sustainable non-woven materials and can be used on the entire body.
The wipes have been dermatologically tested and contain no fragrance or coloring. They are a good substitute for water and soap.
Wet wipes are Vegan and do not contain animal-derived ingredients, only natural and organic plant-derived ingredients.
Certified by the Nordic Swan eco-label and the Nordic standard for asthma allergies, this is a sustainable and safe choice for your baby and the environment.
Recommended use: can clean almost all items anytime and anywhere.
Only for external use. Avoid contact with eyes.
Gentle
Skin-friendly (no perfume or skin tone)
Easy to carry
title: Bambo Nature 生物降解濕紙巾 50片裝
body: Bambo Nature 生物降解濕紙巾是每個嬰兒換尿布台、尿布包、手提袋、公路旅行、野餐、過夜活動必備的物品 - 無論你和寶寶去哪裡都需要。我們友善肌膚、保濕潔淨的濕紙巾由柔軟、可持續的100%粘胺素製成，因此不含塑料，是環境的更好選擇。這些濕紙巾經過皮膚測試，不含香料或色素。是水和肥皂的良好替代品，可用於全身。這些濕紙巾是純素的，不含動物原料，僅含天然和有機植物提取成分。符合北歐天鵝生態標籤和哮喘過敏北歐標準的認證 - 是您寶寶和環境的可持續且安全選擇。建議用法：幾乎可以清潔任何東西，任何時候，任何地方。僅供外部使用。避免接觸眼睛。生物降解（無塑料）溫和柔軟友善肌膚（無香料或色素）新包裝減少蓋子和箔中的塑料100%生物降解！Bambo Nature 生物降解濕紙巾是每個嬰兒換尿布台、尿布包、手提袋、公路旅行、野餐和過夜活動的必備物品。您可以在您和寶寶去的任何地方使用。我們友善肌膚的保濕潔淨濕紙巾由柔軟、可持續的無紡布材料製成，可用於全身。這些濕紙巾經皮膚科測試，不含香料或色素。它們是水和肥皂的良好替代品。濕紙巾是純素的，不含動物原料，僅含天然和有機植物提取成分。根據北歐天鵝生態標籤和北歐哮喘過敏標準認證，這是您寶寶和環境的可持續且安全選擇。建議用法：幾乎可以在任何時候和任何地方清潔幾乎所有物品。僅限外部使用。避免接觸眼睛。溫和友善肌膚（無香料或色調）便於攜帶主題標籤：嬰兒用品, 環保, 生物降解, 潔淨, 可持續, 純素

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO Diapers Size-4 (L) 7-14KG 24pcs【6 packs】
originalBody:
Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO disposable diapers are gentle to the child’s skin and health and have a very soft textile-like back and top sheet that makes the diaper feel like soft clothing. The diaper is designed to fit a child’s anatomy perfectly, which ensures there is no leakage and makes the child feel comfortable while enabling greater freedom of movement.
Our disposable baby diapers are among the most environment-friendly diapers on the market. They are manufactured with care for the environment, and 95 % of all waste coming from the production of Bambo Nature is recycled. Furthermore, the diapers are labeled with the Nordic Eco-label, the FSC®-label, the Asthma Allergy label and are Dermatologically Tested.
Bambo Nature are proud to present all the certifications to ensure all mothers that their babies skin will be free from all the harmful chemicals. We can guarantee that!
7 - 14KG / 15 - 31 LBS
Detailed introduction
 
Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby diapers, Size-4, (L) 7-14KG 24pcs/pack
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The diaper is thinner and the BB wears more comfortably without reducing its ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refreshing and more comfortable experience, keeping the baby dry and reducing the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
 
Features:
· Soft! The back cushion like a textile makes the baby feel softer.
· Elastic side waist circumference.
· The ultra-hygroscopic surface layer allows the water to be absorbed quickly. After being locked, the water molecules can keep dry in addition to being durable and not re-infiltrating.
· Bikini-style three-dimensional tailoring allows babies to move freely and greatly reduces the chance of urine leakage.
· The fresh and breathable design allows babies to breathe freely.
· Bambo Nature has 6 sizes to suit all ages, from birth to the baby's learning to use the toilet and no need for diapers.
title: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO 尿布 Size-4 (L) 7-14KG 24片【6包裝】
body: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO 一次性尿布對嬰兒的皮膚和健康溫和，具有非常柔軟的紡織感背膜和面膜，讓尿布感覺像柔軟的衣物一樣。 尿布設計完美貼合嬰兒的解剖結構，確保不漏尿，讓嬰兒感到舒適，同時實現更大的活動自由度。我們的一次性嬰兒尿布是市場上最環保的尿布之一。 它們經過精心製造，95％來自Bambo Nature生產的所有廢物都被回收。此外，尿布標有北歐生態標籤、FSC®標籤、哮喘過敏標籤並且通過皮膚測試。Bambo Nature很自豪地展示所有認證，以確保所有媽媽們能確信他們寶寶的皮膚不會受到有害化學物質的影響。我們能保證這一點！7 - 14KG / 15 - 31磅詳細介紹丹麥無過敏環保嬰兒尿布，Size-4，(L) 7-14KG 24片/包新升級功能！濕度指示器開發了市場上最佳和最高質量的濕度顯示器。 不含有害化學物質，無過敏性。 液體靈敏條帶會改變顏色以指示潮濕度。更薄的設計改進濕度吸收技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。尿布更薄，BB穿著更舒適，而不會降低其吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好和更柔軟的材料增強舒適性和保護性。Bambo Nature Dream的改進功能帶來清新和更舒適的體驗，保持寶寶干爽，減少患濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。要獲得此標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中包括：包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表示我們產品中使用的所有木浆棉來自可持續森林。在這裡，必須種植更多樹木。同時，我們的產品也經過不同獨立機構的測試，以確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚過敏或刺激。特點：· 柔軟！像紡織品的背墊讓寶寶感覺更柔軟。· 有彈性的側腰部。· 超高吸濕表面層可以快速吸收水分。鎖定後，水分子可以保持乾燥，除了耐用且不再滲透。· 比基尼式立體裁剪讓寶寶自由活動，大大減少尿液外溢的機會。· 新鮮透氣的設計讓寶寶可以自由呼吸。· Bambo Nature有6種尺寸，適合各個年齡段，從出生到寶寶學會如廁，無需尿布。

title: Bambo Nature Rash Free 環保尿布 #1 (NB) 28片【6包裝】
body: Bambo Nature Rash Free 環保一次性尿布對嬰兒的皮膚和健康非常溫和，具有非常柔軟的布質背膜和面層，使尿布感覺像柔軟的衣物一樣。該尿布設計完美貼合嬰兒的解剖結構，確保不會漏尿，讓嬰兒感到舒適，同時能更自由地活動。我們的一次性嬰兒尿布是市場上最環保的尿布之一。我們製造時非常注重環保，Bambo Nature 所有生產廢棄物的95%都得到回收利用。此外，這些尿布標有北歐環保標籤、FSC® 標籤、哮喘過敏標籤，並通過皮膚測試。Bambo Nature 自豪地展示所有認證，以確保所有母親，他們的寶寶皮膚不會受到有害化學品的傷害。我們可以保證這一點！2-5KG / 4-11磅丹麥無過敏環保嬰兒尿布，尺寸1，NB，2-5公斤，每包28片新升級功能！濕度指示器開發了市場上最佳和最高品質的濕度顯示。100% 不含有害化學品和過敏原。液體敏感條帶會改變顏色以指示濕度。更薄的設計改進吸濕技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。尿布更薄，BB穿著更舒適，同時不減少吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好和更柔軟的材料增強舒適度和保護。Bambo Nature Dream的改進功能帶來清爽和更舒適的體驗，讓寶寶保持乾爽，降低患濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝環保標籤證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。為了獲得這個標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中包括：我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表示我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉來自可持續發展的森林。這裡必須種植更多樹木。同時，我們的產品也通過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。特點：· 柔軟！像布料一樣的背墊讓寶寶感覺更柔軟。· 有彈性的側腰圍。· 超吸濕表層讓水分迅速被吸收。在被鎖定後，水分子可以保持乾燥，並具有耐用性不再滲透。· 比基尼式三維裁剪讓寶寶自由活動，大大降低尿液外洩的機會。· 新鮮透氣的設計讓寶寶自由呼吸。· Bambo Nature有6種尺寸，適合所有年齡段，從出生到學會使用廁所並不需要尿布。
tags: ['Bambo Nature', '尿布', '環保', '尿片', 'NB', '新生兒', '環保尿布']

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO Diapers Size-2 (XS) 30pc【6 packs】
originalBody:
Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO disposable diapers are gentle to the child’s skin and health and have a very soft textile-like back and top sheet that makes the diaper feel like soft clothing. The diaper is designed to fit a child’s anatomy perfectly, which ensures there is no leakage and makes the child feel comfortable while enabling greater freedom of movement.
Our disposable baby diapers are among the most environment-friendly diapers on the market. They are manufactured with care for the environment, and 95 % of all waste coming from the production of Bambo Nature is recycled. Furthermore, the diapers are labeled with the Nordic Eco-label, the FSC®-label, the Asthma Allergy label and are Dermatologically Tested.
Bambo Nature are proud to present all the certifications to ensure all mothers that their babies skin will be free from all the harmful chemicals. We can guarantee that!
3 - 6KG / 7-13 LBS
 
Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby diapers, Size-2, XS, 3-6 Kg, 30 pieces/pack
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The diaper is thinner and the BB wears more comfortably without reducing its ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refreshing and more comfortable experience, keeping the baby dry and reducing the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
 
Features:
· Soft! The back cushion like a textile makes the baby feel softer.
· Elastic side waist circumference.
· The ultra-hygroscopic surface layer allows the water to be absorbed quickly. After being locked, the water molecules can keep dry in addition to being durable and not re-infiltrating.
· Bikini-style three-dimensional tailoring allows babies to move freely and greatly reduces the chance of urine leakage.
· The fresh and breathable design allows babies to breathe freely.
· Bambo Nature has 6 sizes to suit all ages, from birth to the baby's learning to use the toilet and no need for diapers.
title: Bambo Nature 輕柔環保無紅屁屁尿布 尺寸2（XS）30片【6包】
body: Bambo Nature 環保無紅屁屁一次性尿布對孩子的皮膚和健康非常溫和，具有非常柔軟的布質背面和表面，使尿布感覺像是柔軟的衣物。該尿布設計完美貼合孩子的解剖結構，確保不會漏尿，讓孩子感到舒適，同時使其能更自由地移動。我們的一次性嬰兒尿布是市場上環保性能最好的尿布之一。製造過程中十分重視環境保護，Bambo Nature 所有生產廢棄物的 95% 都會進行回收利用。此外，這些尿布標有北歐環保標籤、FSC® 標籤、哮喘過敏標籤，並經過皮膚測試。Bambo Nature 自豪地展示所有認證，以確保所有媽媽們的寶寶皮膚不會受到有害化學物質的影響。我們可以保證！3 - 6 公斤／7-13 磅丹麥製造的非過敏環保嬰兒尿布，尺寸2，XS，3-6 公斤，每包 30 片全新升級功能！濕度指示燈在市場上開發了最佳和最高質量的濕度顯示器。100% 不含有害化學物質和非過敏性。液體敏感條帶會改變顏色以指示濕度。更薄的設計提高了吸濕技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。尿布更薄，BB穿著更舒適，同時不減少吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好、更柔軟的材料以增強舒適度和保護。Bambo Nature Dream 的改進功能帶來清新和更舒適的體驗，保持寶寶乾爽，減少患濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature 上的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。為了獲得這個標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中幾項包括：我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC 森林認證，表明我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉來自可持續發展的森林。這裡必須種植更多的樹木以取代使用的樹木。與此同時，我們的產品還通過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保 Bambo Nature 的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。特點：· 柔軟！像布料一樣的背襯使寶寶感到更柔軟。· 有彈性的側腰圍。· 超高吸濕表面層可使水分快速吸收。鎖定後，水分子保持乾燥，並且耐用且不會再次滲透。· 比基尼式三維裁剪使寶寶可以自由移動，大大降低尿液外漏的機會。· 新鮮透氣的設計讓寶寶可以自由呼吸。· Bambo Nature 具有 6 種尺寸，適合所有年齡段，從出生到學會使用廁所且不需尿布。

body: 嬰兒尿布Bambo Nature皮疹免疫環保尿布對嬰兒的皮膚和健康溫和，具有非常柔軟的紡織品般的背面和表面，讓尿布感覺像是柔軟的衣物。這款尿布設計完全符合嬰兒的解剖結構，確保不漏尿，讓嬰兒感到舒適，同時有更大的活動自由度。我們的一次性嬰兒尿布是市場上最環保的尿布之一。在Bambo Nature的生產過程中，95%的廢棄物都被回收利用。此外，這些尿布被標有北歐生態標籤、FSC®標籤、哮喘過敏標籤，並經過皮膚測試。Bambo Nature很自豪地提供所有認證，以確保所有母親的嬰兒皮膚不會受到有害化學物質的影響。我們可以保證！4-9公斤/9-20磅丹麥無過敏環保嬰兒尿布，尺寸2號，XS，4-9公斤，每包30片全新升級功能！濕度指示燈市場上最佳和最高品質的濕度顯示器。100％不含有害化學物質和不過敏。液體敏感條會變色以指示濕度。更薄的設計改進了吸濕技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。尿布更薄，BB穿著更舒適，同時又不減少吸收和保水的能力。更柔軟使用更好、更柔軟的材料增強舒適度和保護。Bambo Nature Dream的改進功能帶來清新和更舒適的體驗，保持嬰兒乾爽，降低患濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實了我們在環保方面的努力。為了獲得此標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中幾項包括：在我們的產品包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表明我們產品中使用的木漿棉來自可持續發展的森林。在這裡，必須種植更多的樹木。同時，我們的產品也經過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。特點：· 柔軟！像紡織品一樣的背墊讓嬰兒感覺更柔軟。· 彈性側腰圍。· 超高吸濕表面層使水分迅速被吸收。鎖定後，水分子可以保持乾爽，而且耐用不會重新滲透。· 比基尼式三維裁剪讓嬰兒自由移動，大大減少尿液洩漏的機會。· 清新透氣的設計讓嬰兒可以自由呼吸。· Bambo Nature有6個尺寸，適合所有年齡段的嬰兒，從出生到學會使用馬桶並且不需要尿布。

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Training Pants Size-4 (L) 7-14KG 20pc【5 packs】
originalBody:
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
7-14KG / 17-31LBS
 
 Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-4, L, 7-14 Kg, 20 pcs/pack
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.
title: Bambo Nature 訓練褲 尺寸4 (L) 7-14公斤 20片【5包裝】
body: Bambo Nature的無疹病ECO友好型一次性訓練褲不含有害化學物質和所有已知過敏原。這些訓練褲旨在讓孩子輕鬆學習如廁。您的幼兒將因我們柔軟、薄和易拉上拉下的設計而感覺像個大孩子。我們的訓練褲採用三層設計，具有超吸收核心，可防止多次濕潤，甚至能在夜間使用。與我們的尿布一樣，Bambo Nature訓練褲具有完全透氣的背板，可保持幼嫩肌膚乾爽。7-14公斤 / 17-31磅丹麥無過敏環保嬰兒訓練褲，尺寸4，L，7-14公斤，20片/包新升級功能！濕度指示器市場上最佳和最高質量的濕度顯示器。100％不含有害化學物質和不過敏。液體敏感條將變色以指示濕度。更薄的設計改進了濕度吸收技術，實現了最大吸收和保水能力。訓練褲更薄，穿著更舒適，而不會影響其吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好和更柔軟的材料，增強舒適度和保護性。Bambo Nature Dream的改進功能帶來了更清爽和更舒適的體驗，保持乾爽並減少濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。為了獲得這個標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中幾個包括：我們產品包裝上的FSC森林認證標籤表明我們產品中使用的木漿棉來自可持續森林。這裡需要種植更多樹木。與此同時，我們的產品還經過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。為了配合幼兒的如廁訓練，Bambo Nature訓練褲的設計可以讓他們輕鬆拉上拉下。此外，如果需要，訓練褲也可以從側面打開。Bambo Nature訓練褲的優勢· 這款環保尿布絕對是孩子學習如廁的好幫手· 不含氯漂白劑、螢光劑和護膚乳液· 訓練褲中的木漿和棉花全部來自於可持續森林· 腰圍和腳圍不含乳膠· 不含氯漂白· 透氣背墊讓孩子的皮膚呼吸，避免皮膚敏感。
tags: ['Bambo Nature', '尿布', '環保', '尿片']

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Training Pants 學習褲 Size-6 (XXL) 18pc【5 packs】
originalBody:
5 packs per case / 每箱5包
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
18+KG / 40+LBS
 Danish non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-6, XXL, 18+ Kg, 18 pcs/pack
 
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.

originalTitle: Organix - Alphabet Biscuits 字母餅乾
originalBody:
12 months +
5x25g
No Junk Promise
Made in Germany
Description
Organic Toddler ABC Biscuits
As easy as ABC! Our scrummy Alphabet Biscuits are great for 12 month+ toddlers learning letters and playing every day.
Made with wholegrain wheat flour mixed with grape juice.
Snacking can be fun and educational too, so what better way to learn their ABCs than with healthy letter biscuits?
Just like our full toddler biscuits range, these wholegrain wheat ABC biscuits are made with quality ingredients and absolutely no nasties.
You’ll love them as much as your little one!
產地: 德國
12個月以上
5x25克
詳細介紹
有機幼兒字母餅乾​我們的字母餅乾非常適合12個月或以上的幼兒學習字母和每天享用。
用全麥麵粉和葡萄汁混合製成。
零食也可能既有趣又有教育意義，那麼，與健康的字母餅乾相比，還有什麼更好的學習ABC的方法呢？
就像我們的全套幼兒餅乾系列一樣，這些全麥小麥ABC餅乾採用優質食材製成! 您會像小孩子一樣愛他們
Our Organic Ingredients
Wholegrain wheat flour 28.9%
Wheat flour 28.9%
Grape juice concentrate 26.8%
Sustainably sourced palm oil 4.6%
Sunflower oil 4.2%
Wholegrain oat flakes 3.5%

body: 12個月以上5x25克無添加垃圾食品德國製造描述有機幼兒ABC字母餅乾學習字母、每天玩耍的12個月以上幼兒，這款美味的字母餅乾非常適合。採用全麥麵粉混合葡萄汁製成。零食既有趣又有教育意義，那麼，何不用健康的字母餅乾來學習ABC呢？就像我們完整的幼兒餅乾系列一樣，這些全麥小麥ABC餅乾採用優質食材製成，絕無添加有害物質。您會如同您的小寶貝一樣愛上它們！有機成分全麥小麥麵粉 28.9%小麥麵粉 28.9%葡萄汁濃縮液 26.8%可持續來源的棕櫚油 4.6%葵花籽油 4.2%全麥燕麥片 3.5%葵花籽 2.5%膨脹劑*（碳酸氫鈉）0.5%硫胺素*（維生素B1）<0.1%總計 100%*膨脹劑（碳酸氫鈉）和硫胺素沒有獲得有機認證。

title: HiPP (UK)有機卡比奇第一階段嬰兒奶粉 (0-6個月) 800克
body: HiPP (UK)有機卡比奇第一階段嬰兒奶粉 (0-6個月) 800克適用年齡：0-6個月德國製造這款營養均衡的乳清基嬰兒奶粉由溫和的有機成分製成（溫和是因為我們的奶牛放牧的草地沒有使用農藥），適合嬰兒不進行母乳餵養或作為母乳的補充品。無麩質不含澱粉從出生開始使用溫和的母乳替代品有機認證PRAEBIOTIK®（從乳糖中獲得的GOS）Ω3（DHA）和Ω6（AA）LCP不適合素食者德國產品HiPP有機嬰兒奶粉包裝在受保護的氣氛中成分：有機脫脂牛奶，有機乳清產品，有機植物油（有機棕櫚油，有機菜籽油，有機葵花籽油），有機乳糖，有機乳糖中的有機半乳寡糖，魚油，氯化鈣，檸檬酸氫鉀，阿爾泰莫里蓮油，膽鹼，檸檬酸鈉，L-苯丙氨酸，正磷酸鈣鹽，L-色氨酸，硫酸鎂，碳酸鈣，L-組胺，硫酸鋅，硫酸亞鐵，穩定劑乳酸，維生素C，維生素E，菸酸，泛酸，硫酸銅，維生素A，維生素B1，碘酸鉀，維生素B6，葉酸，亞硒酸鈉，維生素K，硫酸錳，維生素D，D-生物素，維生素B12。過敏原請參見粗體字的成分。不適合素食者。請注意：產品的成分和過敏信息在發布時是正確的，並定期檢查，但我們建議您查看產品標簽以獲取更多信息。主題標籤: 葡萄糖, 營養, 無麩質, 有機成分, 母乳替代品, 德國。

body: rganix - 迷你芝士餅乾（4x20克）12個月以上4包 x 20克無垃圾承諾德國製造描述幼兒芝士餅乾為我們美味的芝士餅乾瘋狂吧！採用新鮮芝士製成，不添加鹽，包裝在方便的小袋中 - 非常適合放在午餐盒中，是一種給予年幼探險者力量的美味芝士零食，讓他們在冒險時充滿活力！這些幼兒芝士餅乾採用完全天然成分製成，包括有機小麥粉和真正芝士，是一種美味又健康的零食。它們不含人工色素或調味劑，這就是無垃圾承諾！我們在所有幼兒零食中僅使用最優質的天然成分，絕對不添加任何有害物質。這就是無垃圾承諾！我們的有機成分小麥粉 48.8%大米粉 19.5%芝士（牛奶）13.8%葵花籽油 8.5%麥芽提取物（大麥）6.5%麥芽小麥粉 2.1%濃縮檸檬汁 0.4%膨脹劑（碳酸氫鈉）* 0.3%硫胺素（維生素B1）* <0.1%總計 100%*膨脹劑（碳酸氫鈉）和硫胺素（維生素B1）無機認證。

Deliciously, light and fruity, our organic Apple Rice Cake Clouds are gently puffed into chunky circles, perfect for babies 7 months and older to grab, hold and munch on their weaning journey.

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Training Pants 學習褲 Size-5 (XL) 19pc [5 Packs / 5包]
originalBody:
5 packs per case / 每箱5包
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
12-18KG / 27-40LBS
 
 Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-5, XL, 12-18 Kg, 19 pcs/pack
 
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.
title: Bambo Nature 學習褲 Size-5 (XL) 19片 [5包]
body: 每箱5包Bambo Nature的無疹痕環保一次性學習褲不含有害化學物質和所有已知的過敏原。這些學習褲旨在讓孩子更容易學會上廁所。您的孩子將感覺自己像個大孩子，我們的設計靈活、薄、易拉上拉下。我們的學習褲採用三層設計，具有超強吸收核心，可以應對多次濕潤，甚至過夜。與我們的紙尿褲一樣，Bambo Nature學習褲擁有完全透氣的背片，保持嬌嫩肌膚乾爽。12-18公斤丹麥無過敏環保嬰兒學習褲，Size-5，XL，12-18公斤，19片/包全新升級功能！濕氣指示燈市場上最佳和最高品質的濕度顯示。100%不含有害化學物質和過敏原。液體敏感條會變色指示濕度。更薄的設計改進吸濕技術以實現最大吸收和保水能力。學習褲更薄，更舒適，不會影響吸收和保水能力。更柔軟使用更好、更柔軟的材料增強舒適度和保護。Bambo Nature Dream的升級功能帶來了更新和更舒適的體驗，保持乾爽，減少濕疹的可能性。產品描述：Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝生態標誌證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。為了獲得此標誌，我們的嬰兒尿布必須滿足嚴格的標準，其中幾項包括：我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表明我們產品中使用的木漿棉來自可持續森林。這裡需要種植更多的樹木。同時，我們的產品也通過了不同獨立機構的測試，確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。為了配合兒童上廁所的訓練，Bambo Nature學習褲的設計讓他們可以輕鬆拉上拉下。此外，必要時，學習褲也可以從側面打開。Bambo Nature學習褲的優點· 這種環保紙尿褲絕對是兒童學習上廁所的好幫手· 不含氯、螢光劑和油膏· 學習褲中的木漿和棉都是來自可持續森林的· 腰部和腳部環沒有乳膠· 不含氯漂白劑· 透氣背襯讓孩子的皮膚呼吸，避免皮膚敏感。

originalTitle: Bibs - COLOUR Pacifier Sage/Cloud 2pk LATEX
originalBody:
Made in Denmark
Natural rubber latex.
Recommended by midwives to support natural breastfeeding.
The shield is made of 100% food-safe material.
Completely free from BPA, PVC, and phthalates.
Designed and manufactured in Denmark/EU.
 
Description
Our Colour pacifier is the original BIBS pacifier and has been on the market for over 40 years. It has the signature round BIBS shield with three vent holes and round BIBS engraved handle ring. The nipple is round and resembles the shape and size of the mother's breast to provide comfort to your baby.
Cleaning
Before first use, place the pacifier in plenty of boiling water for 3 mins to ensure hygiene. When cleaning the pacifier subsequently, follow these three simple steps:
Put the pacifiers in a clean bowl. Pour them with plenty of boiling water.
Let the pacifiers soak for approx. 5 min.
Pick them up and let them dry on a clean towel.
After cleaning it is not unusual that water remains in the nipple,
simply just squeeze the nipple flat to press out the excess water.
If water drops remain in the nipple, just let the pacifier air-dry.
Do not cook!
Pacifiers are not meant to be boiled and are therefore destroyed by the high heat.
Instead, follow the instructions above, and you are sure to kill the bacteria without compromising the durability of the pacifier.
Don’ts
Do not leave natural rubber latex pacifiers in direct sunlight.
Do not put the pacifiers in the dishwasher.
Do not use UV for the pacifiers.
Do not freeze the pacifiers.
Do not steam over 100°.
TIP: When the child is over 3 months, you can also rinse the pacifier by placing them in a sieve and pouring them with boiling water. This method is faster and avoids water collecting inside the nipple.
Replacement
We recommend a replacement of pacifiers every 4-6 weeks for both safety and hygienic reasons.
Natural rubber latex pacifiers must be replaced when you see the following signs:
Changes in the surface
Changes in size
Change in shape
Rupture in the material
Becomes brittle or sticky
title: 嬰兒奶嘴- COLOUR 奶嘴 鼠尾草/白雲 2入裝 天然乳膠
body: 丹麥製造天然乳膠製成助產士推薦，支持天然哺乳奶嘴護盾由100%食品安全材料製成完全不含BPA、PVC和鄰苯二甲酸酯在丹麥/歐盟設計和製造描述我們的Colour奶嘴是原創的BIBS奶嘴，在市場上已有超過40年的歷史。它具有獨特的圓形BIBS護盾，三個通風孔和圓形BIBS雕刻把手環。奶嘴是圓形的，形狀和大小都像媽媽的乳房，為寶寶提供舒適感。清潔首次使用前，將奶嘴放入沸水中煮3分鐘以確保衛生。清潔奶嘴時，請遵循以下三個簡單步驟：將奶嘴放在乾淨的碗中，倒入足夠的沸水。讓奶嘴浸泡約5分鐘。拿起奶嘴，讓它們在乾淨的毛巾上晾乾。清潔後，奶嘴中可能留有水，只需輕輕擠壓奶嘴扁平以擠出多餘的水分。如果奶嘴中還有水滴，只需讓奶嘴自然風乾。不要煮！奶嘴不應煮沸，高溫會破壞奶嘴。請按照上述指示，確保殺死細菌而不會影響奶嘴的耐用性。禁忌不要將天然乳膠奶嘴暴露在直射陽光下。不要將奶嘴放入洗碗機中。不要使用紫外線消毒奶嘴。不要凍結奶嘴。不要超過100度蒸汽消毒。提示：當孩子滿3個月時，也可以將奶嘴放在篩中，倒入沸水沖洗。這種方法更快，避免水分積聚在奶嘴內。更換出於安全和衛生原因，我們建議每4-6周更換一次奶嘴。當看到以下徵兆時，必須更換天然乳膠奶嘴：表面變化尺寸變化形狀變化材料破裂變得脆弱或黏膩
tags: ['10個月以上', '12個月以上', '6個月以上', '嬰兒奶嘴', '奶嘴', '丹麥製造']

title: 嬰兒安撫奶嘴 - COLOUR系列 雲呢嗎/粉色 2入裝 天然乳膠
body: 丹麥製造天然乳膠材質。孕婦推薦，支持天然哺乳。奶嘴盾牌由100%食品安全材料製成。絕對無BPA、PVC和鄰苯二甲酸鹽。設計及製造於丹麥/歐盟。描述我們的Colour系列安撫奶嘴是原創BIBS安撫奶嘴，已在市場上銷售超過40年。它擁有標誌性的圓形BIBS盾牌，帶有三個通氣孔和圓形BIBS刻印手柄環。奶嘴是圓形的，形狀和大小都類似母親的乳房，為寶寶提供舒適感。清潔首次使用前，將安撫奶嘴浸泡在沸水中3分鐘以確保衛生。清潔奶嘴時，請遵循以下三個簡單步驟：將奶嘴放入乾淨的碗中。倒入大量沸水。讓奶嘴浸泡約5分鐘。取出並放在乾淨的毛巾上晾乾。清潔後，奶嘴內可能殘留水分，只需壓平奶嘴以擠出多餘水分。如果奶嘴內有水滴殘留，請讓安撫奶嘴自然晾乾。不要煮沸！安撫奶嘴不應該被煮沸，高溫會破壞奶嘴。請按上述指示進行清潔，確保殺死細菌，而不會影響奶嘴的耐用性。禁止不要將天然乳膠安撫奶嘴暴露在直射陽光下。不要將奶嘴放入洗碗機中。不要使用UV進行消毒。不要冷凍奶嘴。不要超過100°蒸煮。提示：當孩子超過3個月時，也可以將奶嘴放入篩子中冲洗，加入沸水。這種方法更快，並避免水分積聚在奶嘴內部。更換基於安全和衛生原因，我們建議每4-6周更換一次奶嘴。天然乳膠安撫奶嘴在出現以下問題時應更換：表面變化尺寸變化形狀變化材質破裂變脆或黏膩

originalTitle: Bibs - COLOUR Pacifier Woodchuck/Blush 2pk LATEX
originalBody:
Made in Denmark
Natural rubber latex.
Recommended by midwives to support natural breastfeeding.
The shield is made of 100% food-safe material.
Completely free from BPA, PVC, and phthalates.
Designed and manufactured in Denmark/EU.
 
Description
Our Colour pacifier is the original BIBS pacifier and has been on the market for over 40 years. It has the signature round BIBS shield with three vent holes and round BIBS engraved handle ring. The nipple is round and resembles the shape and size of the mother's breast to provide comfort to your baby.
Cleaning
Before first use, place the pacifier in plenty of boiling water for 3 mins to ensure hygiene. When cleaning the pacifier subsequently, follow these three simple steps:
Put the pacifiers in a clean bowl. Pour them with plenty of boiling water.
Let the pacifiers soak for approx. 5 min.
Pick them up and let them dry on a clean towel.
After cleaning it is not unusual that water remains in the nipple,
simply just squeeze the nipple flat to press out the excess water.
If water drops remain in the nipple, just let the pacifier air-dry.
Do not cook!
Pacifiers are not meant to be boiled and are therefore destroyed by the high heat.
Instead, follow the instructions above, and you are sure to kill the bacteria without compromising the durability of the pacifier.
Don’ts
Do not leave natural rubber latex pacifiers in direct sunlight.
Do not put the pacifiers in the dishwasher.
Do not use UV for the pacifiers.
Do not freeze the pacifiers.
Do not steam over 100°.
TIP: When the child is over 3 months, you can also rinse the pacifier by placing them in a sieve and pouring them with boiling water. This method is faster and avoids water collecting inside the nipple.
Replacement
We recommend a replacement of pacifiers every 4-6 weeks for both safety and hygienic reasons.
Natural rubber latex pacifiers must be replaced when you see the following signs:
Changes in the surface
Changes in size
Change in shape
Rupture in the material
Becomes brittle or sticky
title: 奶嘴 - COLOUR 木頭/粉紅色 2入裝羅馬襪
body: 製造於丹麥天然橡膠乳膠助產師推薦，支持天然哺乳護盾由100%食品安全材料製成完全不含BPA、PVC和鄰苯二甲酸酯設計和製造於丹麥/歐盟描述我們的Colour奶嘴是最原始的BIBS奶嘴，在市場上已經有40多年的歷史。它擁有經典的圓形BIBS護盾，有三個通氣孔和圓形BIBS刻有的手柄環。奶嘴是圓形的，類似母親的乳房形狀和大小，為寶寶提供舒適。清潔在初次使用前，將奶嘴放入充足的沸水中煮沸3分鐘以確保衛生。隨後清潔奶嘴時，請遵循以下三個簡單步驟：將奶嘴放入乾淨的碗中，倒入充足的沸水。讓奶嘴浸泡約5分鐘。拿起它們，讓它們在乾淨的毛巾上晾乾。清潔後，奶嘴內可能會留有水，只需將奶嘴擠扁以擠出多餘的水。如果奶嘴內還有水滴，只需讓奶嘴自然風乾。不要煮!奶嘴不能煮沸，高溫會破壞奶嘴。請遵循上述指示，確保殺死細菌而不影響奶嘴的耐用性。注意事項不要讓天然橡膠乳膠奶嘴暴露在直射陽光下。不要將奶嘴放入洗碗機。不要使用UV處理奶嘴。不要冷凍奶嘴。不要用超過100度的蒸汽。提示：當孩子超過3個月時，您也可以將奶嘴放入篩子中並倒入沸水沖洗奶嘴。這種方法更快，並避免水滴積聚在奶嘴內。更換出於安全和衛生原因，我們建議每4-6周更換一次奶嘴。當您看到以下徵象時，必須更換天然橡膠乳膠奶嘴：表面變化尺寸變化形狀變化材料破損變脆或黏糊主題標籤: 嬰兒用品, 母乳哺育, 衛生保健, 嬰兒保健, 安全注意事項, 歐洲製造

title: 奶嘴 - COLOUR 乳膠奶嘴 鐵灰/嬰兒藍 2入
body: 丹麥製造天然橡膠乳膠材質。助產士推薦，支持天然哺乳。奶嘴盾牌為100%食品安全材料製成。絕對不含BPA、PVC和鄰苯二甲酸鹽。設計和製造於丹麥/歐盟。商品描述我們的Colour奶嘴是原裝BIBS奶嘴，已在市場上銷售超過40年。具有標誌性的圓形BIBS盾牌，帶有三個通氣孔和圓形BIBS刻字手柄環。奶嘴是圓形的，形狀和大小與母親的乳房相似，為您的寶寶提供舒適感。清潔方法首次使用前，將奶嘴放入沸水中煮3分鐘以確保衛生。隨後清潔奶嘴時，請遵循以下三個簡單步驟：將奶嘴放入乾淨的碗中。倒入充足的沸水。讓奶嘴浸泡約5分鐘。取出並讓其在乾淨的毛巾上晾乾。清潔後，奶嘴內可能會留有水，只需擠壓奶嘴扁平以擠出多餘的水。如果奶嘴內仍有水滴，只需讓奶嘴自然風乾即可。不要煮！奶嘴不宜煮沸，高溫會破壞奶嘴。請遵循上述指示，可以在不影響奶嘴耐用性的情況下殺死細菌。注意事項不要將天然橡膠乳膠奶嘴暴露在直射陽光下。不要將奶嘴放入洗碗機。不要使用紫外線來消毒奶嘴。不要冷凍奶嘴。不要蒸超過100度。提示：當孩子超過3個月時，也可以將奶嘴放在篩子中沖洗，然後用沸水沖洗。這種方法更快速，並避免水滴在奶嘴內部聚集。更換奶嘴出於安全和衛生原因，我們建議每4-6週更換奶嘴。當您看到以下徵兆時，必須更換天然橡膠乳膠奶嘴：表面變化尺寸變化形狀變化材料破損變脆或黏膩時。
